name: Neon Sprinter
description:
Game Description
Neon Sprinter is a 3D platformer that relies on speed, control and precision to advance through levels. It's what you would get if you crossed Super Monkey ball with FPS's bunny hopping and air strafing.

It was done using the first person template that comes with Unreal.

Gameplay Instructions
WASD to move, SPACE to jump, MOUSE to control air direction.

Team Name
Ayden Games

Team Members
Mauro Juarez Ariño (Programmer & VFX Artists) - maurojuarezarino@gmail.com
Federico De Schant (Programmer & Game Designer) - fdeschant@gmail.com

Game Name
Neon Sprinter

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission
Unreal Engine's first person template.

A link to gameplay footage to be included in our highlight reel on the Summer #ue4jam results livestream, if you so desire
